FAQ.pageDescription: Find answers to the most commonly asked questions about using the Hotel Swiss platform.
FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Quick answers to your most common questions

whatIsHotelSwiss.question: What is Hotel Swiss?
whatIsHotelSwiss.answer: Hotel Swiss is a contact facilitation platform that connects travelers with verified Swiss hotels. We help you find and contact hotels directly for personalized service and authentic Swiss hospitality.

howItWorks.question: How does the platform work?
howItWorks.answer: Simply search for hotels by location, amenities, or preferences. When you find a hotel you like, use our contact form to reach out directly. The hotel will respond to you with availability, pricing, and any special arrangements.

howToContact.question: How do I contact a hotel?
howToContact.answer: Click on any hotel listing, review the details, and use the 'Contact Hotel' button. Fill out the contact form with your travel dates, requirements, and message. The hotel will receive your inquiry and respond directly to your email.

responseTime.question: How long do hotels take to respond?
responseTime.answer: Most hotels respond within 24-48 hours during business days. Response times may vary during peak seasons or holidays. If you don't receive a response within 48 hours, check your spam folder or contact our support team.

noResponse.question: What if a hotel doesn't respond to my inquiry?
noResponse.answer: First, check your spam/junk email folder. If you still haven't received a response after 48 hours, try contacting the hotel through alternative methods or reach out to our support team for assistance.

verificationBadges.question: What are verification badges?
verificationBadges.answer: Verification badges indicate that a hotel has been verified by our team for authenticity, quality standards, and reliability. Verified hotels have undergone additional screening to ensure they meet our platform standards.

premiumPlacement.question: What is premium placement?
premiumPlacement.answer: Premium placement allows hotels to appear higher in search results for increased visibility. This is a paid service that helps quality hotels reach more potential guests while maintaining fair competition.

trustSafety.question: How do you ensure trust and safety?
trustSafety.answer: We verify all participating hotels, provide secure contact forms, protect your personal information, and offer support throughout the contact process. However, all bookings and transactions occur directly between you and the hotel.

createAccount.question: Do I need to create an account?
createAccount.answer: Creating an account is optional but recommended. With an account, you can save favorite hotels, track your contact history, and receive personalized recommendations based on your preferences.

accountBenefits.question: What are the benefits of having an account?
accountBenefits.answer: Account holders can save favorite hotels, track contact history, receive personalized recommendations, and get priority support. It's free to create an account and enhances your experience on our platform.

fees.question: Are there any fees for using Hotel Swiss?
fees.answer: Using our platform to search and contact hotels is completely free for travelers. We generate revenue through hotel partnerships and premium services offered to hotel partners, not from traveler fees.

directBooking.question: Can I book directly through your platform?
directBooking.answer: We facilitate contact between you and hotels, but all bookings are made directly with the hotel. This ensures you get the best rates, personalized service, and direct communication with your accommodation provider.

stillNeedHelp.title: Still Need Help?
stillNeedHelp.content: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our help center has more detailed information, or you can contact our support team directly.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To bridge the gap between travelers and Swiss hotels by providing a trusted platform that facilitates direct communication, ensures quality standards, and promotes authentic Swiss hospitality experiences.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2020, Hotel Swiss emerged from a simple observation: travelers wanted more personal connections with their accommodations, and Swiss hotels needed better ways to showcase their unique character and hospitality.
story.paragraph2: Rather than creating another booking platform, we chose to focus on what matters most - facilitating genuine connections between travelers and hotels. Our approach allows hotels to maintain their independence while giving travelers direct access to personalized service.
story.paragraph3: Today, we proudly serve as the bridge between discerning travelers and Switzerland's finest accommodations, from boutique mountain lodges to luxury city hotels, all united by our commitment to authentic Swiss hospitality.
